verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w Can|strong="H1397"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w use|strong="H5532"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God? \w Can|strong="H1397"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* benefit \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*?

Does \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*? Does \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w profit|strong="H1215"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8552"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H5973"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w your|strong="H5973"\w* \w reverence|strong="H3374"\w* that He \w rebukes|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* enters \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H5771"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*? \w Are|strong="H7227"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w endless|strong="H7093"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* needlessly demanded security from \w your|strong="H3588"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H6174"\w* deprived \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* of \w their|strong="H3588"\w* clothing.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w gave|strong="H8248"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w withheld|strong="H4513"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w famished|strong="H5889"\w*,

\w while|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* belonged \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2220"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w honor|strong="H5375"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* widows \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty-handed|strong="H7387"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w strength|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* was \w crushed|strong="H1792"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* \w surround|strong="H5439"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5439"\w* \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* peril terrifies \w you|strong="H5921"\w*;

\w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flood|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w covers|strong="H3680"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H7218"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*? \w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w highest|strong="H8064"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w lofty|strong="H7311"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w*!

Yet \w you|strong="H3045"\w* say: ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* God \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Does|strong="H4100"\w* \w He|strong="H4100"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w thick|strong="H6205"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*?

\w Thick|strong="H5645"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* veil \w Him|strong="H7200"\w* \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H1980"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* traverses \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vault|strong="H2329"\w* \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.’

\w Will|strong="H4962"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* stay \w on|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* path \w that|strong="H5769"\w* wicked \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w have|strong="H4962"\w* \w trod|strong="H1869"\w*?

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3247"\w* \w snatched|strong="H7059"\w* \w away|strong="H3332"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* \w were|strong="H3247"\w* swept \w away|strong="H3332"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flood|strong="H5104"\w*.

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* said \w to|strong="H4480"\w* God, ‘\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*?’

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H2896"\w*; \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H4480"\w* stay \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H6662"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w mock|strong="H3932"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*:
‘\w Surely|strong="H3808"\w* our foes \w are|strong="H7009"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3582"\w*, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* fire has consumed \w their|strong="H3808"\w* excess.’

\w Reconcile|strong="H5532"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w at|strong="H5973"\w* \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Him|strong="H5973"\w*; thereby \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w will|strong="H7999"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H8451"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w His|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w His|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

If \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w*. If \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w remove|strong="H7368"\w* \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* tents

\w and|strong="H6083"\w* consign \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H1220"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H1220"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Ophir \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ravines|strong="H5158"\w*,

\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w gold|strong="H1220"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* finest \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w You|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w pray|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w Him|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* He \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* decisions \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w carried|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w light|strong="H5050"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w shine|strong="H5050"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* men \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w brought|strong="H3467"\w* \w low|strong="H8213"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* say, ‘Lift \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H1466"\w*!’ \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lowly|strong="H8213"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3709"\w* \w will|strong="H5355"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* even \w one|strong="H4422"\w* who \w is|strong="H3709"\w* not \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*, rescuing \w him|strong="H4422"\w* through \w the|strong="H4422"\w* \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w your|strong="H4422"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.”
